name: Dinarys GmbH
description:
Dinarys is a full-cycle web development company with expertise in e-commerce and food delivery fields. We provide template based and customized solutions for start-ups, medium and big companies.
 
Additionally, there’s a mobile team to create companion apps for iOS and Android.
 
Our process:
 
Business analyst examines initial requirements, monitors all current technologies and comes up with CMS or framework that meets your business needs perfectly.
 
So if there’s a simple single page website, no need to overpay for custom development. Our team will implement it with Wordpress template. In the same time, if there’s a complex E-bay alike marketplace, we will assign a dedicated team and build it from a scratch.
 
Core e-commerce CMS:
Magento, Drupal, Wordpress, Shopify.
 
Technology:
PHP, Python
 
Dinarys collaborates with:
- offline retailers;
- online retailers;
- agencies, that are looking for a dedicated team to cover web and mobile development.
 
If you are based in Berlin, do not hesitate to visit our office and say "Hi!".
